## model-form package

A library for rendering dynamic forms for models specified in the app .

## Remarks

The library renders the form in a bottom sheet. And provides it with relational state &amp; options for saving the model.

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [ModelFormModule](./model-form.modelformmodule.md) | Responsible for declaring components and providing core injectables. Use forFeature function to configure a default save converter for each feature module. |
|  [ModelFormService](./model-form.modelformservice.md) | Responsible for showing a form sheet with the specified model form |

## Interfaces

|  Interface | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [ModelFormConfig](./model-form.modelformconfig.md) | Represents a configuration object for a model form |
|  [ModelFormServiceConfig](./model-form.modelformserviceconfig.md) | Represents a configuration object for the model form service. |
|  [ModelFormToSaveModelInput](./model-form.modelformtosavemodelinput.md) | The input value passed to converters by the model form when form is submitted. |

## Variables

|  Variable | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [DEFAULT\_SAVE\_CONVERTER](./model-form.default_save_converter.md) |  |

## Type Aliases

|  Type Alias | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [ActionConverter](./model-form.actionconverter.md) | Represents a function that converts a form value to a state action |
|  [FormToSaveModelConverter](./model-form.formtosavemodelconverter.md) | Represents a function that converts a model form input to a state action |
